title: Startup X raises $50M to build AI chips
summary: Startup X announced a $50M round to build AI accelerators for edge devices.

title: Startup X lands $50M to build an AI chip for edge devices
summary: The company says the chip targets low-power inference and automotive use cases.

title: Critics question Startup X's $50M AI chip roadmap
summary: Analysts warn the company faces manufacturing and supply-chain risks.
